Package com.travelbank.knit.viewevents

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GenericEvent
    ViewEventEnv that can be tailored to fire various type of events.
    GenericEventPool
    ViewEventPool that supports GenericEvents.
    KnitOnClickEvent
    ViewEventEnv for simple View.OnClickListener#onClick(View) events.
    KnitOnClickEventPool
    ViewEventPool that supports KnitOnClickEvents.
    KnitOnFocusChangedEvent
    ViewEventEnv for simple View.OnFocusChangeListener#onFocusChange(View, boolean) events.
    KnitOnFocusChangedEventPool
    ViewEventPool that supports KnitOnFocusChangedEvents.
    KnitOnRefreshEvent
    ViewEventEnv for simple SwipeRefreshLayout.OnRefreshListener#onRefresh() events.
    KnitOnSwitchToggleEvent
    ViewEventEnv for simple android.widget.Switch.OnCheckedChangeListener#onCheckedChanged(CompoundButton, boolean) events.
    KnitOnSwitchToggleEventPool
    ViewEventPool that supports KnitOnSwitchToggleEvents.
    KnitOnTextChangedEventPool
    ViewEventPool that supports KnitTextChangedEvents.
    KnitSwipeRefreshLayoutEventPool
    ViewEventPool that supports KnitOnRefreshEvents.
    KnitTextChangedEvent
    ViewEventEnv for simple TextWatcher events.
    TabSelectedEvent
    Tab selection events from TabLayout.
    TabSelectionEventPool
    ViewEventPool for TabSelectedEvents.
    ViewEventEnv
    View Event Environment.
    ViewEventPool<T extends ViewEventEnv>
    Base MemoryPool class for ViewEvents
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    KnitTextChangedEvent.State  
    TabSelectedEvent.State
    Type of callbacks fired by TabLayout.OnTabSelectedListener.
